q: Marjorie Dannenfelser , president of the Susan B. Anthony List, a group that opposes abortion said she trusts that Mike Pence has "come to the place that's right for him and his family." Mike Pence , a story Friday highlighted the effort by a group of conservatives, including former House Republican Majority Leader Dick Armey and former Mike Pence Jim Ryun , to convince him to run for president rather than Indiana governor. For them, the Hoosier checks many boxes- a fresh face on the national scene, a charismatic speaker from the heartland and, most important, a Republican who can appeal to all three elements of the party base: social conservatives, economic conservatives and foreign policy conservatives, the story said. former Mike Pence Jim Ryun , R-Kansas, offered his help in collecting signatures from conservatives and tea party activists to encourage Mike Pence to get into the race. Mike Pence thanked those who had encouraged him, but added: While we may have been able to seek the presidency, we believe our best opportunity to continue to serve the conservative values that brought us to public life is right here in Indiana.
